# This repository includes STM32, and Ambiq Apollo boards Makefile templates that are automatically generated by STM32CubeMX 
## Boards:
- STM32L4 devices in [stm32l4](https://github.com/berab/mcu_make_template/tree/stm32l4) branch
- STM32N6 devices in [stm32n6](https://github.com/berab/mcu_make_template/tree/stm32n6) branch
- APOLLO4L devices in [apollo4l](https://github.com/berab/mcu_make_template/tree/apollo4l) branch
